mapper.delete: delete from p_user where uid = #{uid} and uid != 1
mapper.update: update p_user set remark=#{remark} where uid=#{uid}
mapper.select: SELECT distinct pp.pid from p_user u LEFT JOIN p_user_role ur on u.uid = ur.uid LEFT JOIN p_role p on p.rid = ur.rid LEFT JOIN p_role_permission rp on rp.rid = ur.rid LEFT JOIN p_permission pp on pp.pid = rp.pid where u.uid = #{uid} and pp.parent_id is not null
select r.rid from p_user u left JOIN p_user_role ur on ur.uid = u.uid left join p_role r on r.rid = ur.rid where u.uid = #{uid}
